verses.verse: The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> [were] <S%H6557>Perez,<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> <S%H3756>Carmi,<s%> <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> and <S%H7732>Shobal.<s%>

And <S%H7211>Reaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3189>Jahath,<s%> and <S%H3189>Jahath<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H267>Ahumai<s%> and <S%H3855>Lahad.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> [were] the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6882>Zorathites.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> [were] the sons of <S%H1>Etam:<s%> <S%H5862>Jezreel,<s%> <S%H3157>Ishma,<s%> and <S%H3457>Idbash;<s%> and the <S%H3031>name<s%> of their <S%H8034>sister<s%> [was] <S%H269>Hazzelelponi.<s%>

And <S%H6439>Penuel<s%> [was] the father of <S%H1>Gedor,<s%> and <S%H1446>Ezer<s%> the father of <S%H5829>Hushah.<s%> <S%H1>These<s%> [were] the <S%H2364>sons<s%> of <S%H428>Hur,<s%> the first-born of <S%H1121>Ephrathah,<s%> the father of <S%H2354>Bethlehem.<s%>
And <S%H806>Ashhur,<s%> the father of <S%H1>Tekoa,<s%> <S%H8620>had<s%> <S%H1961>two<s%> <S%H8147>wives,<s%> <S%H802>Helah<s%> and <S%H2458>Naarah.<s%>

And <S%H5292>Naarah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H275>Ahuzzam,<s%> <S%H2660>Hepher,<s%> <S%H8488>Temeni,<s%> and <S%H326>Haahashtari.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5292>Naarah.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2458>Helah<s%> [were] <S%H6889>Zereth,<s%> <S%H3328>Izhar<s%> and <S%H869>Ethnan.<s%>

And <S%H6976>Koz<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6036>Anub<s%> and <S%H6637>Zobebah,<s%> and the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H316>Aharhel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2037>Harum.<s%>

And <S%H3258>Jabez<s%> was <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H3513>honorable<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H3258>Jabez<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> I <S%H3205>bore<s%> [him] with <S%H6090>pain.<s%>"

Now <S%H3258>Jabez<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>"Oh<s%> that Thou wouldst <S%H1288>bless<s%> me <S%H1288>indeed,<s%> and <S%H7235>enlarge<s%> my <S%H1366>border,<s%> and that Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> might be with me, and that Thou wouldst <S%H6213>keep<s%> [me] from <S%H9567>harm,<s%> that [it] may not <S%H6087>pain<s%> me!" And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>granted<s%> him <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H7592>requested.<s%>
And <S%H3620>Chelub<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H7746>Shuhah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4243>Mehir,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was the father of <S%H1>Eshton.<s%>

And <S%H850>Eshton<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of Beth-rapha and <S%H6454>Paseah,<s%> and <S%H8468>Tehinnah<s%> the father of Ir-nahash. <S%H1>These<s%> are the <S%H428>men<s%> of <S%H376>Recah.<s%>
Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%> [were] <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> and <S%H8304>Seraiah.<s%> And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> [was] <S%H2867>Hathath.<s%>

And <S%H4587>Meonothai<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%> and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the father of Ge-harashim, for they were <S%H1>craftsmen.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> [were] <S%H5900>Iru,<s%> <S%H425>Elah<s%> and <S%H5277>Naam;<s%> and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%> [was] <S%H7073>Kenaz.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3094>Jehallelel<s%> [were] <S%H2128>Ziph<s%> and <S%H2129>Ziphah,<s%> <S%H8493>Tiria<s%> and <S%H840>Asarel.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5834>Ezrah<s%> [were] <S%H3500>Jether,<s%> <S%H4778>Mered,<s%> <S%H6081>Epher,<s%> and <S%H3210>Jalon.<s%> (And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1332>Bithia<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4778>Mered<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%>) and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> [and bore] <S%H4813>Miriam,<s%> <S%H8060>Shammai,<s%> and <S%H3431>Ishbah<s%> the father of <S%H1>Eshtemoa.<s%>

And his <S%H3057>Jewish<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3382>Jered<s%> the father of <S%H1>Gedor,<s%> and <S%H1446>Heber<s%> the father of <S%H2268>Soco,<s%> and <S%H1>Jekuthiel<s%> the father of <S%H7755>Zanoah.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H1941>Hodiah,<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5163>Naham,<s%> [were] the fathers of <S%H1>Keilah<s%> the <S%H7084>Garmite<s%> and <S%H1636>Eshtemoa<s%> the <S%H851>Maacathite.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7889>Shimon<s%> [were] <S%H550>Amnon<s%> and <S%H7441>Rinnah,<s%> <S%H1135>Benhanan<s%> and <S%H8436>Tilon.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3469>Ishi<s%> [were] <S%H2105>Zoheth<s%> and Ben-zoheth.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7956>Shelah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> [were] <S%H6147>Er<s%> the father of <S%H1>Lecah<s%> and <S%H3922>Laadah<s%> the father of <S%H3935>Mareshah,<s%> and the <S%H1>families<s%> of the <S%H4762>house<s%> of the <S%H4940>linen<s%> <S%H1004>workers<s%> at Beth-ashbea;

and <S%H3137>Jokim,<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3578>Cozeba,<s%> <S%H3060>Joash,<s%> <S%H8315>Saraph,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1166>ruled<s%> in <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and Jashubi-lehem. And the <S%H1697>records<s%> are <S%H6267>ancient.<s%>

<S%H1992>These<s%> were the <S%H3335>potters<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5196>Netaim<s%> and <S%H1448>Gederah;<s%> they <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> for his <S%H4399>work.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> [were] <S%H5241>Nemuel<s%> and <S%H3226>Jamin,<s%> <S%H3402>Jarib,<s%> <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> <S%H7586>Shaul;<s%>
<S%H7967>Shallum<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H4017>Mibsam<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H4927>Mishma<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4927>Mishma<s%> [were] <S%H2536>Hammuel<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2139>Zaccur<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Now <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> had <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> but his <S%H251>brothers<s%> did not <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> did <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5704>like<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
And they <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> <S%H4137>Moladah,<s%> and Hazar-shual,
at <S%H9053>Bilhah,<s%> <S%H6107>Ezem,<s%> <S%H8434>Tolad,<s%>
<S%H9066>Bethuel,<s%> <S%H2767>Hormah,<s%> <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%>
Beth-marcaboth, Hazar-susim, Beth-biri, and <S%H8189>Shaaraim.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> [were] their <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H4427>reign<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>
And their <S%H9161>villages<s%> [were] <S%H5862>Etam,<s%> <S%H5871>Ain,<s%> <S%H9558>Rimmon,<s%> <S%H8507>Tochen,<s%> and <S%H6228>Ashan,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5892>cities;<s%>

and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H9161>villages<s%> that [were] <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H428>same<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H9058>Baal.<s%> <S%H2088>These<s%> [were] their <S%H4186>settlements,<s%> and they have their <S%H3187>genealogy.<s%>
And <S%H4877>Meshobab<s%> and <S%H3230>Jamlech<s%> and <S%H3144>Joshah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H558>Amaziah,<s%>
and <S%H3100>Joel<s%> and <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3143>Joshibiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8304>Seraiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6221>Asiel,<s%>
and <S%H454>Elioenai,<s%> <S%H3291>Jaakobah,<s%> <S%H3439>Jeshohaiah,<s%> <S%H6222>Asaiah,<s%> <S%H5717>Adiel,<s%> <S%H3450>Jesimiel,<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%>

<S%H2124>Ziza<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8230>Shiphi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H438>Allon,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3042>Jedaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8113>Shimri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah;<s%>

<S%H428>these<s%> <S%H935>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> [were] <S%H5387>leaders<s%> in their <S%H4940>families;<s%> and their fathers' <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H6555>increased<s%> <S%H7230>greatly.<s%>

And they <S%H1980>went<s%> to the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> of <S%H1446>Gedor,<s%> <S%H5704>even<s%> to the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H4217>side<s%> of the <S%H1516>valley,<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> for their <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

And they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8082>rich<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H7342>broad<s%> and <S%H8252>quiet<s%> and <S%H7961>peaceful;<s%> for those who <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6440>formerly<s%> [were] <S%H4480>Hamites.<s%> <S%H2526><s%>

And <S%H428>these,<s%> <S%H3789>recorded<s%> by <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H5221>attacked<s%> their <S%H168>tents,<s%> and the <S%H4586>Meunites<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them <S%H2763>utterly<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in their <S%H8478>place;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> there was <S%H4829>pasture<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> for their <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

And from them, from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> with <S%H6410>Pelatiah,<s%> <S%H5294>Neariah,<s%> <S%H7509>Rephaiah,<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3469>Ishi,<s%> as their <S%H7218>leaders.<s%>

And they <S%H5221>destroyed<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> <S%H6413>who<s%> <S%H6413>escaped,<s%> and have <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
